content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

#### Iron Plate Smelting Setup at Position (-15.0, -51.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace at position (-15.0, -51.0)
- Burner inserter at position (-14.5, -52.5) for transferring items to the furnace
- Wooden chest at position (-16.5, -50.5) for storing iron ore
- Burner mining drill at position (-17.0, -52.0) for mining iron ore

#### Coal Mining Setup at Position (41.0, -86.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position (41.0, -86.0)
- Burner mining drill at position (43.0, -86.0)
- Wooden chest at position (43.5, -84.5) for storing coal
- Burner inserter at position (41.5, -83.5) for transferring coal to the chest

#### Additional Smelting Setup at Position (-13.0, -50.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace at position (-13.0, -50.0)
- Burner inserter at position (-11.5, -50.5) for transferring items to the furnace
- Wooden chest at position (-13.5, -51.5) for storing iron plates

### ERROR TIPS

#### Errors when extracting items from empty entities
- Ensure the entity (e.g., furnace or chest) has items before attempting to extract.

#### Errors when inserting items without sufficient inventory
- Check your inventory for the required items before attempting to insert them into an entity.

#### Errors when smelting without fuel or ingredients
- Always ensure the furnace has both fuel and the necessary ingredients before starting the smelting process.

#### Errors when mining with a full chest
- Empty the chest at the drop position of the mining drill to continue mining operations.

#### Errors when placing items into a blocked or full destination
- Ensure the destination entity (e.g., furnace or chest) has space before attempting to insert items.

#### Errors when refueling without coal in inventory
- Harvest coal from a coal patch before attempting to refuel entities like furnaces or mining drills.
